name: FORGE 10-Phase Development Workflow
description: AO-native comprehensive development workflow with embedded debate gates: Initialize → Brainstorm (Debate Gate) → Research → Design → Plan → Test → Build → Validate → Review → Learn

phases.name: Initialize
phases.description: Personalize FORGE setup for the project

phases.name: Brainstorm
phases.description: Explore approaches, debate options, and reach structured decision

gate.name: Debate Gate
gate.description: Mandatory structured debate before completing brainstorm
gate.ao_behavior: FORGE generates debate plan only; AO executes debate via separate sessions
gate.standalone_behavior: FORGE runs structured self-debate, writing same artifacts

phases.name: Research
phases.description: Validate brainstorm decision with best practices research

phases.name: Design
phases.description: Create design specifications and mockups based on research

phases.name: Test Strategy
phases.description: Define test strategy and write test cases before building

phases.name: Build
phases.description: Execute implementation with TDD discipline and automatic test loop

phases.name: Validate
phases.description: Verify implementation against requirements with evidence

phases.name: Review
phases.description: Code review and quality assessment from multiple angles

quickCommands.name: /forge:quick
quickCommands.description: Quick task execution for small changes

quickCommands.name: /forge:help
quickCommands.description: Show workflow status and recommendations including debate state

quickCommands.name: /forge:swarm
quickCommands.description: AO mode: Outputs AO spawn plan only. Standalone: Parallel agent execution
quickCommands.ao_behavior: Generates parallel task plan for AO execution

quickCommands.name: /forge:debate
quickCommands.description: Execute or generate debate for current phase

skill-router.description: Routes tasks to appropriate skills and agents

brainstormer.description: Ideation and exploration with debate integration

advocate.description: Debate role: argues FOR an approach

skeptic.description: Debate role: argues AGAINST an approach

synthesizer.description: Debate role: reconciles positions and produces decision

aoIntegration.debate_orchestration: AO spawns debate sessions, FORGE generates plan only
